import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import axios from 'axios' import Rating from '../components/Rating' function BookPopUp({match}) { const [book, setBook] = useState([]) const mystyle = { width:"100%", height:"100%", }; useEffect(() => { async function fetchBook(){ const {data} = await axios.get(`/api/books/${match.params.id}`) setBook(data) } fetchBook() }, []) return (




  • BOOK NAME: {book.name}
  • CATEGORY: {book.category}
  • AGE GROUP: {book.age}
  • DESCRIPTION: {book.description}
 {/* */}
) } export default BookPopUp
